parameters.name: DBInstanceConnType
parameters.description:
The cluster link type. The backend randomly selects the default value. Valid values:

*   **lvs**: Linux virtual server.
*   **proxy**: proxy server.
*   **dns**: domain name system.

parameters.name: DBNodeClass
parameters.description:
The specifications of the node. For information about node specifications, see the following topics:

*   PolarDB for MySQL: [Specifications of compute nodes](~~102542~~)
*   PolarDB for Oracle: [Specifications of compute nodes](~~207921~~)
*   PolarDB for PostgreSQL: [Specifications of compute nodes](~~209380~~)

parameters.name: DBType
parameters.description:
The type of the database engine. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **Oracle**

parameters.name: DBVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the database engine

*   Valid values for the MySQL database engine:

    *   **5.6**
    *   **5.7**
    *   **8.0**

*   Valid values for the PostgreSQL database engine:

    *   **11**
    *   **14**

*   Valid value for the Oracle database engine: **11**

parameters.name: DispenseMode
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the zones in which the single-zone deployment method is supported. Default value: 0. Valid values:

*   **0**: no value returned
*   **1**: returns the zones.

parameters.name: NeedMaxScaleLink
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to create Maxscale. Valid values:

*   **true** (default)
*   **false**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query available regions.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SubDomain
parameters.description: The subdomain. It is the child domain of the top-level domain name or parent domain. For example, if the parent domain name is cn-beijing, its child domain can be cn-beijing-i-aliyun.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The zone ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query available zones.
